verses.verse: Observe <WH8104> the month <WH2320> of Abib <WH24>, and keep <WH6213> the passover <WH6453> unto Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>; for in the month <WH2320> of Abib <WH24> Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> brought thee forth <WH3318> out of Egypt <WH4714> by night <WH3915>.

And thou shalt sacrifice <WH2076> the passover <WH6453> unto Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, of the flock <WH6629> and the herd <WH1241>, in the place <WH4725> which Jehovah <WH3068> shall choose <WH977>, to cause his name <WH8034> to dwell there <WH7931>.

Thou shalt eat <WH398> no leavened bread <WH2557> with it <WH7651>; seven days <WH3117> shalt thou eat <WH398> unleavened bread <WH4682> therewith <WH3899>, even the bread of affliction <WH6040>; for thou camest forth <WH3318> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> in haste <WH2649>: that thou mayest remember <WH2142> the day <WH3117> when thou camest forth <WH3318> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> all the days <WH3117> of thy life <WH2416>.

And there shall be <WH7200> no leaven seen <WH7200> with thee in all thy borders <WH1366> seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>; neither shall any of the flesh <WH1320>, which thou sacrificest <WH2076> the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> at even <WH6153>, remain <WH3885> all night until the morning <WH1242>.
Thou mayest <WH3201> not sacrifice <WH2076> the passover <WH6453> within any <WH259> of thy gates <WH8179>, which Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> giveth thee <WH5414>;

but at the place <WH4725> which Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> shall choose <WH977>, to cause his name <WH8034> to dwell in <WH2076>, there thou shalt sacrifice the passover <WH6453> at even <WH6153>, at the going down <WH935> of the sun <WH8121>, at the season <WH4150> that thou camest forth <WH3318> out <WH3318> of Egypt <WH4714>.

And thou shalt roast <WH1310> and eat <WH398> it in the place <WH4725> which Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> shall choose <WH977>: and thou shalt turn <WH6437> in the morning <WH1242>, and go <WH1980> unto thy tents <WH168>.

Six <WH8337> days <WH3117> thou shalt eat <WH398> unleavened bread <WH4682>; and on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> shall be a solemn assembly <WH6116> to Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>; thou shalt do <WH6213> no work therein <WH4399>.

Seven <WH7651> weeks <WH7620> shalt thou number <WH5608> unto thee <WH2490>: from the time thou beginnest to put the sickle <WH2770> to the standing grain <WH7054> shalt thou begin <WH2490> to number <WH5608> seven <WH7651> weeks <WH7620>.

And thou shalt keep <WH6213> the feast <WH2282> of weeks <WH7620> unto Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> with a tribute <WH4530> of a freewill-offering <WH5071> of thy hand <WH3027>, which thou shalt give <WH5414>, according as Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> blesseth thee <WH1288>:

and thou shalt rejoice <WH8055> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, thou <WH1121>, and thy son, and thy daughter <WH1323>, and thy man-servant <WH5650>, and thy maid-servant <WH519>, and the Levite <WH3881> that is within thy gates <WH8179>, and the sojourner <WH1616>, and the fatherless <WH3490>, and the widow <WH490>, that are in the midst <WH7130> of thee <WH4725>, in the place which Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> shall choose <WH977>, to cause his name <WH8034> to dwell there <WH7931>.
And thou shalt remember <WH2142> that thou wast a bondman <WH5650> in Egypt <WH4714>: and thou shalt observe <WH8104> and do <WH6213> these statutes <WH2706>.

Thou shalt keep <WH6213> the feast <WH2282> of tabernacles <WH5521> seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>, after that thou hast gathered <WH622> in from thy threshing-floor <WH1637> and from thy winepress <WH3342>:

and thou shalt rejoice <WH8055> in thy feast <WH2282>, thou <WH1121>, and thy son, and thy daughter <WH1323>, and thy man-servant <WH5650>, and thy maid-servant <WH519>, and the Levite <WH3881>, and the sojourner <WH1616>, and the fatherless <WH3490>, and the widow <WH490>, that are within thy gates <WH8179>.

Seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> shalt thou keep a feast <WH2287> unto Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> in the place <WH4725> which Jehovah <WH3068> shall choose <WH977>; because Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> will bless <WH1288> thee in all thine increase <WH8393>, and in all the work <WH4639> of thy hands <WH3027>, and thou shalt be altogether joyful <WH8056>.

Three <WH7969> times <WH6471> in a year <WH8141> shall all thy males <WH2138> appear <WH7200> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> in the place <WH4725> which he shall choose <WH977>: in the feast <WH2282> of unleavened bread <WH4682>, and in the feast <WH2282> of weeks <WH7620>, and in the feast <WH2282> of tabernacles <WH5521>; and they shall not appear <WH7200> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068> empty <WH7387>:
every man <WH376> shall give as he is able <WH4979>, according to the blessing <WH1293> of Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> which he hath given thee <WH5414>.

70 <WH8199> and officers <WH7860> shalt thou make <WH5414> thee in all thy gates <WH8179>, which Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> giveth <WH5414> thee <WH7626>, according to thy tribes; and they shall judge <WH8199> the people <WH5971> with righteous <WH6664> judgment <WH4941>.

Thou shalt not wrest <WH5186> justice <WH4941>: thou shalt not respect <WH5234> persons <WH6440>; neither shalt thou take <WH3947> a bribe <WH7810>; for a bribe <WH7810> doth blind <WH5786> the eyes <WH5869> of the wise <WH2450>, and pervert <WH5557> the words <WH1697> of the righteous <WH6662>.

That which is altogether <WH6664> just <WH6664> shalt thou follow <WH7291>, that thou mayest live <WH2421>, and inherit <WH3423> the land <WH776> which Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> giveth thee <WH5414>.
Thou shalt not plant <WH5193> thee an Asherah <WH842> of any kind of tree <WH6086> beside <WH681> the altar <WH4196> of Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, which thou shalt make thee <WH6213>.
Neither shalt thou set thee up <WH6965> a pillar <WH4676>; which Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> hateth <WH8130>.
